Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameController
  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that controls the main game functions

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void closeDiceOnTimeout​(javafx.stage.Stage diceStage)
      closeDiceOnTimeout method closes the window when enough time has passed.

      displayMessage method writes a message in the chat window.
      void gameOver​(java.lang.String[] users)
      gameOver method ends the game.

      init method contains the logic behind the game screen.

      movePlayer method moves the player after thrown dice.

      onDiceRolled method cancels the timer, and updates the player.

      removePlayer method removes a player from the running game.
      void returnToMain()
      returnToMain method changes the window to main menu window.

      roll method controls the roll window giving the players chance to roll themselves.

      • init

        public void init​(UIController parent,
                 javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader loader,
                 javafx.stage.Stage stage,
                 int playerCount)
        init method contains the logic behind the game screen.
        Parameters:
        parent - reference to UIController.
        loader - the loader object.
        stage - the stage object.
        playerCount - amount of player in the game.

      • roll

        public void roll​(PlayerUpdate update)
        roll method controls the roll window giving the players chance to roll themselves.
        Parameters:
        update - an player update to the players turn after thrown dice.

      • closeDiceOnTimeout

        public void closeDiceOnTimeout​(javafx.stage.Stage diceStage)
        closeDiceOnTimeout method closes the window when enough time has passed.
        Parameters:
        diceStage - window giving the player the chance to throw.

      • onDiceRolled

        public void onDiceRolled()
        onDiceRolled method cancels the timer, and updates the player.

      • movePlayer

        public void movePlayer​(PlayerUpdate update)
        movePlayer method moves the player after thrown dice.
        Parameters:
        update - playerUpdate object.

      • removePlayer

        public void removePlayer​(java.lang.String username,
                         int order)
        removePlayer method removes a player from the running game.
        Parameters:
        username - username of the player who's getting removed.
        order - which spot in the order the player had.

      • displayMessage

        public void displayMessage​(java.lang.String message)
        displayMessage method writes a message in the chat window.
        Parameters:
        message - message that will be written in the chat window.

      • gameOver

        public void gameOver​(java.lang.String[] users)
        gameOver method ends the game.
        Parameters:
        users - array of users in the game.

      • returnToMain

        public void returnToMain()
        returnToMain method changes the window to main menu window.
